title: Mountain Sunrise
description: Early morning hike to catch the first light hitting the peaks. There's something magical about being above the clouds as the world wakes up.

title: Forest Path
description: A peaceful trail through the Portuguese countryside. Sometimes the best debugging happens while walking through nature.

title: Coastal View
description: The Atlantic coast of Portugal offers stunning vistas. This spot has become my go-to place for reflection and inspiration.

title: Historic Architecture
description: Exploring Lisbon's rich history through its architecture. Every building tells a story, much like every line of code has a purpose.
